titleStmt.title: SII 7.536: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer

No. 536. (A.R. No. 310 of 1901). This inscription is noticed in the South-Indian Inscriptions, Vol. I, p. 126. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE GANGAIKONDAN-MANDAPA AT MAMALLAPURAM, CHINGLEPUT TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
mayalvarunti cempiyaṉkiḻānaṭi Orumaruṅ kuṭanamarn=tiruppa Aruḷcamaiya poṟkoṭ ṭi
maiyappāvaiyuñ civaṉumpol puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum cemponvirasiṁhāsaṉattu viṟṟirun=taruḷiya kovirācakecaripanmarāna tripuvaṉaccak
karavarttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu patinālāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Āmurkoṭṭattu Āmurnāṭṭu
puramāṉa jananātapurattu Āḷuṭaiyār tirumu muṭaiyārkku tiruppaḷḷiEḻuccisantikku tiruamutupaṭikku Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭu
veṇṭuvanattukku nilaṅ koṇṭu viṭukaikku maṇaiyiṟkoṭṭattu kaṉṟunāṭṭu Aṇaikkaraiputtūr viyāpāri kuḷantaikiḻāṉ
tevan vaṭukanāraṇan yittevar śrīpaṇṭārattu Oṭukkiṉa kācu paṉniraṇṭu yikkācu panṉiraṇṭum yinnakarattommum periḷammaiyomu
m Ittevar Ātidāsacaṇṭeśvarar kaiyāl nāṅkaḷ kaikkoṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷurp piṭākai kaṭu
curan perumāḷeri kaḻaniyāna panmāyecuvaraviḷaākattu tevatānamppaṭi ceṟu me
lvarampukku mekku tenpākkellai yiṭaiyanyeri Erivāyil tirukaḻuku naṟpa vaḻikku vaṭakkum melpāṟ
This inscription is noticed in the South Indian Inscriptions, Vol. I, p. 126.
The beginning and end of this inscription are lost.
Digital edition of SII 7.536 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
